pages.text: Getting resources is important.$(br2)Use a Weedwood Pickaxe and find a cave. If you already have Slimy Bones, you can upgrade your pickaxe, if not you can find them as an ore.

This dimension has many new ores. The most important ones are Sulfur, Octine, Syrmorite and Valonite.$(br2)Sulfur can be used as coal, Syrmorite and Octine can be used for tools, weapons and different blocks. Valonite is the rarest resource and can be compared to diamonds.
